system.description:
Also starting at 1st level, the bridge that you formed between your body and magic allows you to fly into a rage that bolsters both. You may enter into this rage as a bonus action.

While raging, you gain the following benefits and restrictions if you aren’t wearing heavy armor:

  • You may use your spellcasting ability modifier in place of your Strength modifier when making Strength saving throws and ability checks. In addition, you may use your spellcasting ability modifier in place of your Strength modifier when determining the distance and height that you can jump.

  • You gain resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

  • You may not cast or concentrate on spells, except for spells learned through this class and cast using spell points.

  • You have advantage on Constitution checks to resist having your concentration broken.

Your rage lasts for 1 minute. It ends early if you are knocked unconscious. You can also end your rage on your turn as a bonus action.

Once you have raged the number of times shown for your runespell rager level in the Rages column of the Runespell Rager table, you must finish a long rest before you can rage again.
